@mfmackenzie @Lesley_DSouza @kbartold Lots of folks who'd benefit from institute but who do not ID as 'new pro'. Let's be thoughtful. #SAcdn
@mfmackenzie @Lesley_DSouza @kbartold like the institute, 'new pro' language makes me uncomfortable...cont
@mfmackenzie @kbartold I would suggest that this isn't *just* a 'new pro' issue! Lots of seasoned folks who haven't learned SD theory.#SAcdn
@kbartold YES. Would love to see an SD theory primer course (online) for all #SApros in #SAcdn based on @cacusstweets competencies
A3: Align learning RE: theories w/ @cacusstweets competencies. #sacdn
A2: Folks will sometimes use their 'gut' or lived experience to inform. Must be matched w/ theory + data. #sacdn
A1 CONT' ...Schlossberg transition, Magolda/King Self-authorship, Perry intellectual dev #sacdn
A1 All. the. theories. Sanford Challenge + Support, Maslow Hierarchy, Kolb Learning, White racial consciousness model, Astin...#sacdn
